author: powercode
body:
We currently infer object as the type of (1,2,3)[0].
While not incorrect, we can clearly do better in the cases where the target expression is an ArrayLiteral.

comments.author: MartinGC94
comments.body: Seems like this was fixed in: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/8100 so this issue can be closed.

title: Improve type inference for IndexExpressionAst
